RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 1 1M Turf CR: 60. Maiden Claiming Purse 9100. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DARTIGA perfect spot inside to far turn split horses quarter pole ran off. TOTAL SMOKESHOW saved ground to the stretch, angled out ran on for place no match. AMATTEROFPRINCIPLE well placed behind leaders throughout, settled for third. MIDNIGHT XO no speed to far turn with a wide run to improve in late going. CAPTIVE STAR chased leader to the half, short lead out of far turn, faltered. BIRD SET FREE fidget in gate with a bobble at the start and never close. ARRINGTON never close. LADY BIRD KISSES troubled run into first turn while widest, never in contention. WILL VIRGINIA DARE sent quickly to the front, stayed far turn, back step pulled up and subsequently vanned off. Race was hand timed due to a bad sensor on the turf course, all turf races will be hand timed for the remainder of the meet. Acm

ENTRY.NAME: Dartiga
ENTRY.COMMENT: perfect spot inside to far turn split horses quarter pole ran off

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Xo
ENTRY.OWNER: Williams Rashawn Justice Floyd Constable Marc-Henri and Hancock Dana
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to far turn with a wide run to improve in late going

ENTRY.NAME: Will Virginia Dare
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent quickly to the front, stayed far turn, back step pulled up

ENTRY.NAME: Arrington
ENTRY.COMMENT: never close

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Bird Kisses
ENTRY.COMMENT: troubled run into first turn while widest, never in contention

ENTRY.NAME: Bird Set Free
ENTRY.COMMENT: fidget in gate with a bobble at the start while evenly throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Amatterofprinciple
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed behind leaders throughout, settled for third

ENTRY.NAME: Total Smokeshow
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground to the stretch, angled out ran on for place no match

ENTRY.NAME: Captive Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased leader to the half, short lead out of far turn, faltered

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON THREE RACES IN 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since August 15, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since Then All owed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RIVER BOY prompted pace to far turn, took over at the half to run clear. HIGH POWERED threw head at the start, far back, saved ground grinded on for 2d. HARD LIGHTING raced back of leaders from inside, kept on for show spot. RUBINSTEIN raced evenly throughout with no response. DUDLEY sharp break, dueled to the half, gave way readily.

ENTRY.NAME: High Powered
ENTRY.COMMENT: threw head at the start, far back, saved ground grinded on for 2d

ENTRY.NAME: Dudley
ENTRY.COMMENT: sharp break, dueled to the half, gave way readily

ENTRY.NAME: River Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace to far turn, took over at the half to run clear

ENTRY.NAME: Hard Lighting
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced back of leaders from inside, kept on for show spot

ENTRY.NAME: Rubinstein
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced evenly throughout with no response

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 68. Claiming Purse 9000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 15, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: NOTION tracked off rail to quarter pole, roused in the stretch, clear. GREENSFELDER no speed with an off rail run throughout ran on for place spot. FAST ROY pinched back in tight at the start, three wide run into stretch. HECTOR B saved ground throughout throughout while evenly no late kick. SUNDAY MISCHIEF inside to the front led to the stretch, gave way readily.

ENTRY.NAME: Sunday Mischief
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside to the front led to the stretch, gave way readily

ENTRY.NAME: Fast Roy
ENTRY.COMMENT: pinched back in tight at the start, three wide run into stretch

ENTRY.NAME: Notion
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked off rail to quarter pole, roused in the stretch, clear

ENTRY.NAME: Hector B
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground throughout while evenly no late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Greensfelder
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed with an off rail run throughout ran on for place spot

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 4 1M Turf CR: 70. Claiming Purse 9100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 15, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred). (If transferre d to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LUCKY SHORE well rated to far turn off rail, ran on steadily to gallop past and clear late. SHE'S A KEEPER sprinted away to a long lead, held to the stretch, outkicked late. PRETTY HEART chased leader throughout to no avail, settling for the show spot. BIA BOLT RUNNER no early speed trailed to far turn, finished up well in the lane. WANNAGOCAMPING no speed to far turn and cut the gap in the stretch. DEESSE raced along evenly to the stretch while closing the gap late. THREE POINT KUZ ran on evenly with no response when needed. MISS MATCHMAKER never prominent throughout. CORIMA through early, dropped back readily. GET CLEAR never factored. Race was hand timed due to a bad sensor on the turf course, all turf races will be hand timed for the remainder of the meet. Acm

ENTRY.NAME: Deesse
ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly to the stretch while closing the gap late

ENTRY.NAME: Get Clear
ENTRY.COMMENT: never factored

ENTRY.COMMENT: no early speed trailed to far turn, finished up well in the lane

ENTRY.COMMENT: ran on evenly with no response when needed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 49. Maiden Claiming Purse 9000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE, FOUR, FIVE, AND SIX YEARS OLD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: K S GERALDINE inside speed from the gate, well handled to the wire and held sway. PARTY NEVER ENDS chased winner throughout with a game effort to the wire for the place spot. PEPPER SWEET broke sharp outside, outpaced to the turn, ran on mildly late. AWESOME MARINA rushed off rail to the turn to close the gap in the final stages. RUNNETH OVER raced along evenly with no response when needed. SIPSEY lost best chance with a terrible start, rushed while empty late.

ENTRY.NAME: K S Geraldine
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed from the gate, well handled to the wire held sway

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Watershed Bloodstock LLC & W. S. Farish

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Marina
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed off rail to the turn to close the gap in the final stages

ENTRY.COMMENT: raced along evenly with no response when needed

ENTRY.NAME: Party Never Ends
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased winner throughout with a game effort to the wire for place

ENTRY.NAME: Pepper Sweet
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp outside, outpaced to the turn, ran on mildly late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 6 1 1/16M Turf CR: 94. Handicap Purse 20000. FOR THREE-YEARS-OLD AND UPWARD FREE NOMINATION BY TUESDAY SEPTEMBER 5 ,2023 WEIGHTS ASSIGNED BY SEPTEMBER 7, 2023. Starters must be named through the entry box by the usual time of closing High Weights and Ohio Bred Preferred. Should this race be determ ined to run on the dirt the distance will remain the same. Nominations closed Tuesday, September 5, 2023 with 17 nominations. (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and a Sixteenth.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPLIT THE WICKETS stuck inside to far turn, maneuvered off the rail for clear run and accelerated in the final furlong under steady handling to the wire. BULLBRIAR no speed to far turn with a wide late kick for place spot in the final furlong. BLESS THE KITTEN tracked leader to far turn, led in stretch, weakened for show. COMMANDANDCONTROL tracking throughout, stayed to the stretch run and faltered late. ROGUE ELEMENT inside speed to the front dueled to the half, gave way readily. Race was hand timed due to a bad sensor on the turf course, all turf races will be hand timed for the remainder of the meet. Acm

ENTRY.NAME: Split the Wickets
ENTRY.OWNER: Runnin' Down A Dream Stable LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: stuck inside to far turn, maneuvered off rail, accelerated clear

ENTRY.NAME: Rogue Element
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed to the front dueled to the half, gave way readily

ENTRY.NAME: Bullbriar
ENTRY.COMMENT: no speed to far turn with a wide late kick for place spot

ENTRY.NAME: Bless the Kitten
ENTRY.OWNER: Wright Darlene and Wright James R
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked leader to far turn, led in stretch, weakened for show

ENTRY.NAME: Commandandcontrol
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracking throughout, stayed to the stretch run and faltered late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 7 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 92. Starter Allowance Purse 14400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Since August 15, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Ra ces For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MASAI MAN tracked top pair to turn, three wide stretch run, to stride clear late WELL CONNECTED slow into stride from the gate, stayed to deep stretch, gutsy effort to the wire. D'MONEY HONEY pressured leader to the turn with a game effort to the wire. TIME HEIST raced along evenly behind the top three while well off rail late. VASILEVSKIY (IRE) broke tardy from the gate and never in the hunt thereafter.

ENTRY.COMMENT: slow into stride, stayed to deep stretch, game effort to wire

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELTERRA PARK RACE 8 1M Turf CR: 99. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 14400. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $10,000. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races At A Mile Or Over Since August 15, 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. S uch A Race Since Then Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000 (Claiming Races For $7,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred). (If transferred to the Main Track, this race will be run at One Mile and 70 Yards.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: INDOCUMENTADO reserved early on, rallied four wide stretch, grinded to the lead. SUBDUED dueled throughout, kept on gamely in the stretch for place spot. TARTINI raced along evenly, mild bid in the stretch run, leveled off late. AVIANO kept up while never far back throughout while mildly to wire. DRAFT CAPITAL tried to keep up throughout with an even effort in the stretch. J W RUCKUS sharp break to the front dueled to the stretch, gave in late. DIGITAL SOFTWARE never far back throughout with no response in the stretch run. COMMAND CENTRAL bunched up into far turn, faded back. Race was hand timed due to a bad sensor on the turf course, all turf races will be hand timed for the remainder of the meet. Acm
